resources.string: Added AI soundtrack successfully. Save video?
"About to download and install HD plug-in: "
Image displayed while the cast receiver is playing an ad
Visit facebook.com/device and enter the code shown above.
Unexpected error while downloading an image.
To connect your account, open the Facebook app on your mobile device and check for notifications.
"You're in control - choose what info you want to share with apps."
"Mi Video can't access videos on your device. Allow access in the Settings."
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.

"To be able to use its services, you must agree that %1$s will collect, process, and use your personal information. You'll be deemed to have read and agreed to our Privacy Policy when you tap \"Agree\" below."
After you revoke authorization, the app will stop collecting data, and all the related data will be deleted from our servers. This might make the app virtually unusable. Revoke authorization anyway?
You can customize the list of your channels now.
Protected content not supported on API levels below 18
This device does not support the required DRM scheme
This Content is not available in your country.
No content available for this movie. Please try again later
No content available for this Tv Show. Please try again later
Invalid URL. Please try again later
No network connection detected. Please ensure you are connected to a network source and try again.
Server is not available at this moment.Please try again.
Socket Timeout. Please try again later
"Sorry, we're unable to play this video right now. Please try again after some time."
"Couldn't submit. Check your network settings and try again."
Submitted successfully. Thanks for your feedback!
Tap the screen to try again
Please grant this permission to control the player brightness
"The following channels won't be displayed on the Home page."
What are your video language preferences? You can select multiple languages.
Saved successfully. You can change your language preferences in the settings.
No network connection detected. Please ensure you are connected to a network source and try again.
"Sorry, your request can't be completed right now. Please try again after some time."
To control playback, tap the bar at the bottom.
You can only send 1 file at a time
Set successfully. View hidden items in the \"Hidden videos\" folder.
Mi Video is ready to install
Update Mi Video to take screenshots
"Your system doesn't support recording sound. The recordings are silent."
Recorded successfully. You can share now.
Set password to view hidden videos
Took a screenshot successfully. You can share it now.
"Couldn't add subtitles. Make sure the file isn't corrupted."

Get subtitles

from opensubtitles.org.

All online subtitles are provided by opensubtitles.org.
"Couldn't connect to the network. Connect and try again."
Set successfully. You can view unhidden items now.
"Can't play this video on your device."
Use gestures to zoom in and out
Update Mi Video to use all its features
"Couldn't connect to the network. Check your network settings and try again."
"Can't use this feature now. Network access is restricted."
"Couldn't find media file. Jumped to the upper-level folder."
"Couldn't load info. Pull down to refresh."
Update Mi Video plug-in to the latest version to be able to play this video. Update now?
"Can't play this video. Update Mi Video to the latest version first."
Clear cache files saved on your device
"Some features won't be available if you revoke authorization"
"Couldn't initialize plug-in. Wait a minute and try again."
(For users outside China, please enter the mobile phone number in the following format: + country code mobile phone number, example: +91 817282982)
Password must be 8-16 characters in length and include both numbers and letters (case sensitive).
Too many verification codes have been sent to this number. Wait 24 hours and try again.
Check your network settings and try again
Give Mi Video the required permissions to allow it to work normally.

"Go to Settings > Apps > Mi Video > Permissions, and give Mi Video the following permissions:
1. Access storage 2. Access device info"
Mi Video needs to access the IMEI number of your device to do the following:
Better customize its services for your device;
Increase the security of your account.​
For accessing device status and pausing playback during calls
For accessing items, saving files, displaying and playing local videos
This phone has been associated with several Mi Accounts in a short period of time. Try using another phone number.
Tap to switch to list view
"PiP isn't supported in this version of your system."
"Previews aren't supported for this video format."
Playback speed is unstable now. Go back to the default speed.
"Couldn't add subtitles. Make sure the file isn't corrupted."

"Couldn't find results. Try a different set of filters."

Turn on online services to use this feature.

Turn on to receive online video recommendations
